components.description: A medium-small-sized square shaded completely black. Smaller than the ⬛ Black Large Square and ◾ Black Medium-Small Square but larger than the  ▪️ Black Small Square.
components.title: Black Medium Small Square

description: A medium-small-sized square shaded completely black. Smaller than the ⬛ Black Large Square and ◾ Black Medium-Small Square but larger than the  ▪️ Black Small Square.
title: Black Medium Small Square

version.description:
The following characters we added to Unicode in 2002, with many given emoji presentation status in the years 2010-2015.

Those given emoji presentation status by Unicode were part of Emoji 1.0 in 2015.

emoji_net_data.definition: Black Medium-small Square was approved as part of Unicode 3.2 in 2002 under the name “Black Medium Small Square” and added to Emoji 1.0 in 2 http://emojipedia.org/black-medium-small-square/
emoji_net_data.name: black medium-small square

bn:00111084a: Forming a right angle, especially at right angles with the mast or the keel, and parallel to the horizon; said of the yards of a square-rigged vessel when they are so braced.
Having four equal sides and four right angles or forming a right angle

apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the black medium-small square emoji presents as a perfectly rendered, solid obsidian shape with subtle, soft rounded edges that catch the light. Its deep, matte black finish, characteristic of Apple's refined aesthetic, conveys a sense of order, emphasis, or a placeholder for content. This precisely designed square on Apple devices is often used to create visual structure or mark a specific point within text.
